title: Best of Comedy Gold Minds
description:
While Kevin is on vacation, celebrate some of the best moments from Comedy Gold Minds so far, featuring interviews with Eddie Murphy, Arsenio Hall, Jerry Seinfeld, and Tiffany Haddish.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Tiffany Haddish, Kevin Hart, Jerry Seinfeld, Arsenio Hall, Eddie Murphy)
